requirements.description: Customers are not allowed to use the Application Services to send spam or duplicative messages that violate applicable laws.

type.summary: Prohibition on sending spam or unsolicited messages

requirements.description: Customers are not permitted to process, send, or store Prohibited Information using the Application Services.
Prohibited Information includes personally identifiable information collected from children under the age of 13 or from online services directed toward children.

type.summary: Prohibition on collecting personal information from children
